Item.description: Bulky 7.62x55 revolver, designed for underwater hunting. Drum holds up to 3 rounds. Earned its name as one of the heftiest handguns on Europa.
A belt of 80 rounds, designed for light machineguns, like A102 and M21.
A boxy 7.62 Kurz machinegun, designed by Coalition as a powerful fire support tool for its special task squads. This must be the heaviest weapon you've operated so far.
Standart .38 round. Without any great ability to pierce armor, this round's main purpose is self defence against robbers and crawlers.
.38 round with a depleted fuel heading. Effective against armor, tends to pierce multiple lairs of it.
Standart magazine for best of assault rifles on Europa. Holds 20 rounds.
If you see this gun, it means that its here for compatibility. Deconstruct it to get the actual CO weapon.
Replaces nucleargun. Please disable mods that override talnets.
If you see this gun, it means that its here for compatibility. Deconstruct it to get the actual CO weapon.
Cheap and so wide-spread weapon of self-defence. Unable to shoot underwater.
An old-fashioned japanise rifle with a on-barrel device, that allows it to fire 40mm grenades. Effective on long ranges.

Item.name: M500 Anti-Infantry grenade launcher
Item.description: 40mm Grenade launcher, used by Earth's military. Found it's purpose on Europa as a heavy weapon of choice against large monsters or heavily-armored humans.
